summary: Replaces the one handed block bash with a frontkick!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3196887-1390564194.png[/img]

[COLOR=#5f497a][FONT=Impact][SIZE=7]Kick-Blocked![/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3196887-1390564194.png[/img]

This mod was created to be used with "Immersive First Person View". If you are anything like me and always wanted to kick people this mod is for you!
It replaces the horrible 3rd person sword bash that looked like some sort of epileptic seizure, with a kick.

So far it replases the one 1h, 2h and bow bash animations. I kept the shield bash vanilla as well as the torch for some variation. The animations were created to look good in immersive first person view and not in 3rd person so I would recommend installing PCEA to prevent NPC's to use the animation. I also recommend the Forceful Bash mod for this, gives a new spin on combat :D the animation can be used without immersive first person view bet then you will only be able to see it when in third person. And since it was created for first person the whole animation is shortened to be faster and might look a little "twitchy".

This is my first uploaded mod so please give me some feedback![/center]

Installation:
Drag and drop to your skyrim Data folder, No esp needed.


Links:
[COLOR=#5f497a][SIZE=3][FONT=Impact][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14871/?]PC Exclusive Animation Path[/URL][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#5f497a][SIZE=3][FONT=Impact][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30697/?]Forceful Bash[/URL][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR]
author: HumiIiation
